alert.note: Alert for Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued November 27 at 3:56PM EST until November 28 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.8 to 6.2 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Bristol MA and Southern Plymouth MA Counties. In Rhode Island, Southeast Providence RI, Eastern Kent RI, Bristol RI, Washington RI and Newport RI Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 2 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Splashover or very minor coastal flooding along roads adjacent to Narragansett Bay and Buzzards Bay. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
